questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant shape of the presented object, as visually apparent?

As seen in the image, what is the apparent overall structural rigidity of the object?

Based solely on the image's visual details, how would you characterize the edges of the presented object?
From a visual standpoint, what design feature is notably present along the longer sides of the object?
